appDescription.message: Re-realize scrollbar, simple design and floating display

cant_use_custom_scroll_bar.message: The current page does not support the use of custom scrollbar (If the webpage was opened before the installation of this extension, please refresh and try again)

change_top_progress_bar_color.message: Change the color of the top progress bar

click_to_open_reading_model.message: Click to open the reading mode

click_top_progress_to_change.message: Click the top scrollbar to change

fail_get_article_data.message: Failed, new articles can no longer use reading mode!

is_need_scrollbar.message: Show scrollbar when the mouse moves to the far right

is_not_used_custom_scroll_bar.message: The current webpage is using the 「native scroll bar」. To use the custom scrollbar, please click the upper circular button.

is_top_progress_auto_hide.message: Automatically hide the top progress bar after scrolling

is_used_custom_scroll_bar.message: The current webpage is using the 「custom scroll bar」. To use the native scrollbar, please click the upper circular button.

mark_point.message: Double-click the webpage to mark the node, and press Ctrl to switch.

not_support_mark.message: The current page is not supported

not_support_reading_model.message: The current page is not supported

notice_change_color.message: Click on the color block on the right to select the color.

permission_tip_1.message: In order to better realize the function (for example, the number of nodes that correctly display the page mark when switching labels), you need to obtain Tabs permission, you can click

reload_page.message: Web pages opened before the extension installation need to be refreshed before the extension function can be used.

scroll_tip_4.message: on the far right of the page (still available after disappearing) to quickly return the page to the

scroll_tip_to_bottom.message: Click on the top 1/3 of the rightmost part of the page to quickly return the page to the bottom.

scroll_tip_to_top.message: Click on the bottom 2/3 of the rightmost part of the page to quickly return the page to the top.

scrollbar_will_disappear.message: After the extension is enabled, the scrollbar of the webpage will disappear and a more intuitive browsing position will be displayed at the top.

to_open_read_model.message: Click the 'circle R' icon at the top to open the reading mode (only applicable to the article pages, such as

turn_page.message: Click on the left-most upper and lower parts of the webpage to quickly turn pages.
